articles.title: No Late-Night Calls Or Foul Language, Loan Recovery Agents Beware: RBI - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Loan recovery agents calling at odd hours or using foul language is unacceptable, said Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Shaktikanta Das on Friday.

articles.title: Market Crash: Top 10 firms lose Rs 3.91 lakh cr in m-cap; TCS, RIL biggest laggards - Economic Times
articles.description: Markets have been extremely bearish of late amid rate hikes by global central banks, unrelenting foreign fund outflows and jump in crude oil prices.The market valuation of the 10 most valued domestic firms eroded by Rs 3,91,620.01 crore last week.
